name: Sporeling
description: At the end of each turn, gain +1 attack.

name: Mycelium Sprout
description: At the start of your turn, gain +1 defense.

name: Fungal Guardian
description: Gains +1 attack at the start of each turn.

name: Mycelium Crawler
description: At the start of your turn, gains +1 attack if enemy has a creature.

name: Fungal Colossus
description: At the start of each turn, gains +1 defense.

name: Spore Infester
description: Gains +1 to energy when it attacks.

name: Energy Bloom
description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 energy if you damaged the opponent.

name: Fungal Rage
description: All creatures you control gain +1 to attack.

name: Regrowth Spores
description: At the end of each turn, heal 2 damage from all creatures you control. A creature cannot heal more than their normal def.

name: Spore Burst
description: Deal 2 damage to the opponent's life.

name: Energy Drain
description: Deal 3 damage to a target creature.

name: Spore Shield
description: Equip to a creature. That creature gains +2 defense.

name: Fungal Blade
description: Equip to a creature. That creature gains +2 attack.

name: Spore Infector
description: Equip to an enemy creature. That creature loses 1 attack.

name: Mushroom Parasite
description: Equip to an enemy creature. That creature is tapped and does not untap.
